skins.selfIntroduction: I am Richelieu, the lead ship of the Richelieu class. During my history as a ship, I lived through good times and bad times, and I also witnessed the rise and fall of my homeland... This time, I hope to protect all that is dear to me up until the end. Together with this fleet, I strive for liberty and peace...
skins.acquisition: I am Richelieu, Cardinal of Iris Libre. If you too will fight for freedom and faith, then I shall bring you victory, Commander.
skins.login: Bonjour, Commander. Please relax and drink this tea while I carry out my morning prayers.
skins.details: Place your faith in me. Follow my lead. Offer up your prayers. Seek the Lord. Only then will the path of God be opened...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I believe that any obstacle can be overcome with fervent faith and untiring efforts.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Those round little creatures... If I recall correctly, Algérie told me they're called "Meowfficers."
skins.secretaryIdle3: Have I met the Royal Navy yet? Yes. I hope to deepen our bond, so I'm bringing some wine to the next tea party.
skins.secretaryIdle4: Please make use of my precious allies, the Iris Templar Knights, at your discretion. After all, one of their missions is to fight for peace.
skins.secretaryIdle5: The relationship between those from the Eagle Union and those from the Iris Libre is a bit... Well, I get the feeling that Jean Bart would get along with them just fine, though.
skins.secretaryTouch: Please listen to our prayers closely, Commander.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If nothing else, your audacity is commendable.
skins.secretaryHeadpat: May Heaven confer upon you its blessings.

skins.shipDescription: This swimsuit... Yes, the one ?mile picked out for me, seems a bit skimpy... I didn't think she'd be the type to trick me into wearing something like this, but... Commander, where are you looking?
skins.acquisition: This swimsuit... Yes, the one ?mile picked out for me, seems a bit skimpy... I didn't think she'd be the type to trick me into wearing something like this, but... Commander, where are you looking?
skins.login: Scenery that calms the heart... Commander, you've got good taste.
skins.details: Iris' teachings do not go as far as to forbid its followers from spreading their wings. Let us enjoy today with everyone to our heart's content. Consider this as yet another of Heaven's many blessings.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, I'll be heading to the beach for a bit. ... Hehe. Indeed, this is a bit different from how I am usually. Would you like to come along with me?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Frozen treats are most effective against hot and humid weather like this... Shall we ask Dunkerque to prepare some more next time?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Jean Bart... Perhaps it's better to spend some more time with her... Sigh...
skins.secretaryTouch: My... Where are you taking me, Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If you know what's good for you, I wouldn't assume that a girl is defenseless just because she's in a swimsuit.
